question: Which State/UT Government has entered into a MoU with IIT Bombay and Tata Projects Ltd for construction of Smog Tower?
explanation:
The Government of the Union Territory of Delhi has entered into a Memorandum of Understanding MoU with Indian Institute of Technology - Bombay and Tata Projects Limited for construction of a smog tower at Connaught Place. 
The proposed 20 meter-high smog tower would be fitted with several air purifiers to purify the air. As per the terms of the MoU, the construction of the smog tower would be completed in 10 months.
